import "../styles/Auth.css"; // Keep the CSS for general styling const Auth = () => { const [isLogin, setIsLogin] = useState(true); // State to toggle between login and signup const handleToggle = () => { setIsLogin(!isLogin); // Toggle between login and signup }; return (
Login Form
Signup Form
{isLogin ? (
Forgot password?
Not a member? Signup now
) : (
)}
); }; export default Auth;
